Class PhotoItem

extends java.lang.Object

      • setDateFromDateFormatString

        public void setDateFromDateFormatString(java.lang.String date)
                                 throws java.text.ParseException
        Setter the date from string containing date in AppCommunicationConsts.DATE_FORMAT_APP format. Cuts off precision of milliseconds to avoid ambiguity.
        Parameters:
        date - is a string containing date in AppCommunicationConsts.DATE_FORMAT_APP format.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
